codes.IRCD: Objection is raised as the compensation amount quoted on the investigation response appears incorrect.
codes.IRIC: Objection is raised as the data provided on the investigation response is insufficent to address the original request.
codes.IRRR: Closure is requested as the investigation request has been resolved by requestor.
codes.IRSI: Closure is requested as the investigation request was sent in error.
codes.NARR: See AdditionalInformation element for action reason.

description: Specifies the requested action, as published in an external investigation action code set.
name: ExternalInvestigationActionReason1Code
